verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, that \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w both|strong="G0846"\w* \w together|strong="G2596"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w*, \w that|strong="G5620"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* and \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w unbelieving|strong="G0544"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* stirred \w up|strong="G1892"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G2559"\w* their \w minds|strong="G5590"\w* evil \w affected|strong="G2559"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Long|strong="G2425"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* abode \w they|strong="G1304"\w* speaking \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, which gave \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* unto the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w granted|strong="G1325"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* to be \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* was \w divided|strong="G4977"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* part \w held|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* part \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* an \w assault|strong="G3730"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, and \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w*, to \w use|strong="G5195"\w* \add them\add* \w despitefully|strong="G5195"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w stone|strong="G3036"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,

They were ware \w of|strong="G4894"\w* \add it\add*, and \w fled|strong="G2703"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Derbe|strong="G1191"\w*, \w cities|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Lycaonia|strong="G3071"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto the region that lieth round \w about|strong="G4066"\w*:
And \w there|strong="G2546"\w* they preached the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*, \w impotent|strong="G0102"\w* in his \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* a \w cripple|strong="G5560"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother’s|strong="G3384"\w* \w womb|strong="G2836"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* had \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*:

The \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w* stedfastly \w beholding|strong="G0816"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perceiving|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* to be \w healed|strong="G4982"\w*,

\w Said|strong="G2036"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w Stand|strong="G0450"\w* \w upright|strong="G3717"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w leaped|strong="G0242"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* had \w done|strong="G4160"\w*, they lifted \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* in the speech of \w Lycaonia|strong="G3072"\w*, The \w gods|strong="G2316"\w* are come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* in the \w likeness|strong="G3666"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* they \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, \w Jupiter|strong="G2203"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w Mercurius|strong="G2060"\w*, \w because|strong="G1894"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w chief|strong="G2233"\w* \w speaker|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* of \w Jupiter|strong="G2203"\w*, which \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w oxen|strong="G5022"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w garlands|strong="G4725"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w gates|strong="G4440"\w*, and would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* done \w sacrifice|strong="G2380"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*.

\add Which\add* \w when|strong="G0191"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add of\add*, they \w rent|strong="G1284"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w*, and ran \w in|strong="G1530"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, crying \w out|strong="G2896"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Sirs|strong="G0435"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* do \w ye|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*? \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* of like \w passions|strong="G3663"\w* with \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, and \w preach|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5209"\w* that ye should \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w vanities|strong="G3152"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* that are \w therein|strong="G1722"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w times|strong="G1074"\w* \w past|strong="G3944"\w* \w suffered|strong="G1439"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* to walk \w in|strong="G4198"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G2532"\w* he \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* without \w witness|strong="G0267"\w*, in that he did \w good|strong="G0015"\w*, and \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w rain|strong="G5205"\w* from \w heaven|strong="G3771"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fruitful|strong="G2593"\w* seasons, \w filling|strong="G1705"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* with \w food|strong="G5160"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gladness|strong="G2167"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* with \w these|strong="G5023"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3004"\w* \w scarce|strong="G3433"\w* restrained \w they|strong="G2664"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, that they \w had|strong="G2380"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* done \w sacrifice|strong="G2380"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* there came \w thither|strong="G1904"\w* \add certain\add* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, \w who|strong="G2532"\w* \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, having \w stoned|strong="G3034"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w drew|strong="G4951"\w* \add him\add* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w supposing|strong="G3543"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had been \w dead|strong="G2348"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w*, as the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* stood round \w about|strong="G2944"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, and \w came|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the next \w day|strong="G1887"\w* he \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Derbe|strong="G1191"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* when they had preached the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* to \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w taught|strong="G3100"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w*, they returned \w again|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add to\add* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*,

\w Confirming|strong="G1991"\w* the \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \add and\add* exhorting \w them|strong="G3870"\w* to \w continue|strong="G1696"\w* in the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w ordained|strong="G5500"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* in \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, and had \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w fasting|strong="G3521"\w*, they \w commended|strong="G3908"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* after they had passed \w throughout|strong="G1330"\w* \w Pisidia|strong="G4099"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Pamphylia|strong="G3828"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w preached|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Perga|strong="G4011"\w*, they went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Attalia|strong="G0825"\w*:

And \w thence|strong="G2547"\w* \w sailed|strong="G0636"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, from \w whence|strong="G3606"\w* they had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w recommended|strong="G3860"\w* to the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they were \w come|strong="G3854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w together|strong="G4863"\w*, they \w rehearsed|strong="G0312"\w* all \w that|strong="G3745"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* unto the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* they \w abode|strong="G1304"\w* \w long|strong="G3641"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.
